refnamediv.refpurpose: Read data from an arduino port using the Csound-Arduino protocol.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Read integer data from an arduino port with CsoundArduino protocol.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: iPort -- port number obtained from a arduinoStart opcode.
iStream -- Number of the data stream in range 0 to 30.
iSmooth -- halftime of a portamento filter to smooth the stream of data. Defaults to 0 meaning no filtering.
kval -- data to read in range [0, 1023].
